item.description:
Join us for the 14th Annual Walk for Animals at Wampatuck State Park!!

Lets spend next Sunday walking for a great cause - show off our pups and raise a few bucks!

The MSPCA walk we participated in a few weeks ago was a success!! The pack members who came said they really enjoyed it.

Rain or Shine! 10am - 2pm

http://www.standishhu...
Directions, details are on the website above.
On the website you can download the registration form so you can get sponsors. Even if you choose not to get sponors, you can make a donation for as little as $10. If you raise $50, you get a free T-shirt.

If you can't make a donation or do not want to get sponsors, please show up and walk with the pack anyway to support the cause. I will be getting sponsors so I can make a donation in my name, but as the organizer of our group.

I will linger around the registration table so everyone can find me. Please look for my two French Bulldogs - you can't miss them!!! More likely than not they will be causing a scene :-)

Hope to see a lot of you at the event! Pack member, Susan, mom of Henry and Nestle, will be there as a guest at the event promoting her store, Woof and Whimsy in Weymouth Landing. Stop by her table and say hello!
item.how_to_find_us: Wait close by the registration table - Look for my French Bulldogs!

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Benefit Walk for Animals - Folk and Furfest!
